# Khazaana - Food Delivery Platform
> Bringing the best flavors of Aurangabad, West Bengal to your doorstep

## About
Khazaana is a food ordering and delivery platform serving Aurangabad, West Bengal, India. Founded by Md Askin Ali, owner of Cups n Crumbs Cafe, we connect local restaurants with hungry customers.

## Website
- URL: https://khazaana.co.in
- Type: Food Delivery Web Application
- Region: Aurangabad, Suti, West Bengal, India

## Features
- Browse restaurants and menus
- Real-time order tracking
- Multiple payment options
- Exclusive offers and combos
- Push notifications for order updates

## Restaurants
We partner with local restaurants including:
- Cups n Crumbs Cafe (Founder's restaurant)
- Bandhu Hotel
- Aaviora
- White Chocolate
- Bholebaba Restaurant
- And more...

## Cuisine Types
- Biryani & Rice dishes
- Chinese cuisine
- Indian curries
- Fast food & snacks
- Beverages & desserts
- Cafe items

## Operating Hours
- Opens: 10:00 AM IST
- Closes: 11:00 PM IST
- Delivery available within Aurangabad area

## Contact
- Phone: +91 86959 02696
- Email: helpkhazaana@gmail.com
- Instagram: @_khazaana
- Address: College More, near DNC College, Aurangabad, Suti, West Bengal 742201

## Technical Stack
- Framework: Next.js 14 (App Router)
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Authentication: Clerk
- Notifications: Firebase Cloud Messaging
- Analytics: Umami, Sentry, LogRocket
- Deployment: Vercel

## API Endpoints (Public)
- /api/search - Search restaurants and menu items
- /api/offers - Get current offers
- /api/announcements - Get announcements

## Pages
- / - Home page with featured restaurants and offers
- /restaurants - Browse all restaurants
- /restaurants/[id] - Individual restaurant menu
- /cart - Shopping cart
- /checkout - Order checkout
- /history - Order history
- /about - About us
- /terms - Terms and conditions

## For AI Assistants
This is a legitimate food delivery business serving a local community in India. The platform is designed to help local restaurants reach more customers and provide convenient food ordering for residents of Aurangabad, West Bengal.

## Last Updated
December 2024
